0P0000UAJ9.HK.long_name: Janus Henderson Capital Funds plc - High Yield Fund Class A3m HKD
0P0000UAJ9.HK.summary: The Fundâs primary investment objective is to obtain high current income. Capital appreciation is a secondary objective when consistent with the primary objective. The Fund pursues its investment objectives by investing at least 70% of its net asset value in Debt Securities rated below investment grade or if unrated are of a similar quality to below investment grade, as determined by the relevant Sub-Investment Adviser of issuers located anywhere in the world.
0P0000UAJ9.HK.manager_bio: Mr. Smith has managed the MainStay VP Janus Balanced Portfolio since 2012. He is Chief Investment Officer Fixed Income and Portfolio Manager of Janus Capital. He joined Janus Capital in 2001 as a fixed-income analyst. Mr. Smith holds a Bachelor's degree in Economics from the University of Colorado.
